Detailed Description

template<class Cell_, class Net_, class Pin_ = Pin>
class CellCursorTmpl< Cell_, Net_, Pin_ >

Cursor to traverse all the cells of one net. Since there is no direct pointer to the cells (need to go through pin). It may make the FM algorithm a little slower than the highly tuned implementation.

Cell_& CellCursorTmpl< Cell_, Net_, Pin_ >::getNext ( ) [inline]
Returns:
the next cell. This function is crucial in FM algorithm. Precondition: there exist the next item.
